cast.name: 艾历克斯·休·安德森 Alex Høgh Andersen
尼克莱·寇佩尼库斯 Nicolaj Kopernikus
卡塔林·格雷-罗森塔尔 Katrine Greis-Rosenthal

writer.name: 克里斯托弗·鲍伊 Christoffer Boe

director.name: 克里斯托弗·鲍伊 Christoffer Boe

introduction: Rejseholdet – det første mord is set in Denmark in 1927. In detail, we follow ambitious police officer Otto Himmelstrup, who leads the newly formed Travel Squad, which is tasked with assisting local police in solving particularly difficult crimes. When a body is found in a burnt-out summer house in Esbjerg, Otto and his team begin to unravel an unusual murder mystery, revealing power struggles and corruption among the city’s elite. The closer the Travel Squad gets to the truth, the more dangerous it becomes – and soon Otto is not only battling powerful enemies but also confronting his own dark side to get to the bottom of the case.
